title: Is Votes.finance Based?
body:
Project Name: VOTES.finance
Token Ticker: VOTE
Offering for Rover: (3% of total supply of VOTE)

Website: https://votes.finance
Twitter: https://twitter.com/votesfinance
Medium: https://medium.com/@votes.finance
Telegram: https://t.me/joinchat/TJaDMFb-g-a39fU6uS6RVA
Github: TBA after launch

Details:

Votes.finance, is an experimental blockchain powered voting and rewards platform. It combines yield farming, prediction markets, and decentralized governance to enable global voting events with a prize pool for the winning voters.

Votes.finance is very Based. It allows for regional decisions to be escalated to the world stage and voted on globally, creating a new perspective on how regional views contrast with global vlews. Also if you vote for the winning candidate you get sUSD!

The outcome of each VOTE season are decided through the Proveable oracle platform tied to Wolfram Alpha

Current status: Launch soon, by or before 3:59 AM on Sun, Nov 1 2020 UTC. 

VOTE is combining several DeFi technologies (prediction markets, decentralized governance, yield farming, oracles) to help users gain a unique, global perspective on the outcome of specific events by/with a platform for transparent, global voting on any type of event. Unlike traditional prediction markets we combine DeFi protocols in a unique way and focus on a single event at a time allowing for community building an growth around the core VOTE token while generating new candidate tokens for each season that entitle winning voters to their share of the prize pool.
author: 0x09BE68823D2A7a22Be569816c9b2c104628545cF
